config-section.toggle-shops.description: The below shops were automatically detected by the game's data. Enabling a shop does not necessarily mean it will be supported by this mod, but unchecking will disable it.
config-option.force-open.name: Force Open
config-option.force-open.tooltip: Set a keybind that when held down will force a shop to open regardless of heart level or if has been enabled.
config-option.heart-level.name: Require Heart Level
config-option.heart-level.tooltip: Require a minimum heart level with the shop owner for self-checkout (set to 0 to disable).
